moves.description: CORRECTED: Fix was based on fictional model versions - need to identify actual OpenRouter vs internal model ID mismatches
moves.details: Research revealed claude-4-sonnet-20241022 doesn't exist. Real issue is likely claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022 vs claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620 mismatch
